title: JS Workshop - Building a widget using web components with Pradhumna Pancholi
details:
Details
-------

ZOOM LINK: [https://zoom.us/j/95403506180](https://zoom.us/j/95403506180)

Welcome to the JS Workshop! This is a place for intermediate and advanced JavaScript developers to learn new skills, experiment with interesting technologies and have tons of fun.

In this workshop Pradhumna will take us through building a widget with web components and deploy it using unpkg.

ZOOM LINK: [https://zoom.us/j/95403506180](https://zoom.us/j/95403506180)

Prerequisites:

*   A laptop with a web dev environment, including an editor and a local server
    
*   Some proficiency in JavaScript
    
*   A cheerful and inquisitive attitude
    

The speakers codes on the zoom, and everyone in the room copies that code into their own laptops. You'll (stay) home with an exciting new program, and if there's time left over at the end you'll do something cool with it and show a demo to everyone. Fun!

Timetable:

6:30 - zoom open, eat pizza (at home if you happen to have some)

7:00 - workshop code-along

8:30 - extend the codebase

9:00 - everyone (stays) home
